savevtkpart.comment: Creates VTK files for each PART (default=false)

computetime.comment: Start and end of measures. (default=simulation time)

output.comment: Creates CSV and binary files of measurements (default=false)

outputdt.comment: Time between output measurements. 0:all computed measurements (default=TimeOut)

outputtime.comment: Start and end of output measures. (default=simulation time)

savevtkpart.comment: Creates VTK files for each PART (default=default.savevtkpart)

outputdt.comment: Time between output measurements. 0:all computed measurements (default=default.outputdt)

outputtime.comment: Start and end of output measures. (default=default.outputtime)
Start and end of output measures. (default=default.outputtime)
Start and end of output measures. (default=default.outputtime)

masslimit.comment: Mass value to calculate free-surface (default=uses coefmasslimit)
Coefficient to calculate mass of free-surface (default=0.5 on 3D and 0.4 on 2D)

savevtkpart.comment: Creates VTK files for each PART (default=default.savevtkpart)

target.comment: Indicates the mkbound of selected particles to compute forces

vec1.comment: First axis vector to define the measurement grid (use 0,0,0 to ignore)

vec2.comment: Second axis vector to define the measurement grid (use 0,0,0 to ignore)

vec3.comment: Third axis vector to define the measurement grid (required for elevation calculation)

size1.comment: Length and distance between measurement points for first direction

size2.comment: Length and distance between measurement points for second direction

size3.comment: Length and distance between measurement points for third direction

dirdat.comment: Direction vector for computed linear velocity or other variables

masslimit.comment: Coefficient to calculate mass of free-surface (default=0.5 on 3D and 0.4 on 2D)

outputdata.comment: Type of results requested (vel, veldir, rhop, zsurf)

output.comment: Creates CSV and binary files of measurements (default=false)

kclimit.comment: Minimum value of sum_wab_vol to apply the Kernel Correction. Use NONE to disable (default=0.5)

kcdummy.comment: Dummy value for non-corrected values. Use NONE to disable (default=0)

vec1.comment: First axis vector to define the measurement grid (use 0,0,0 to ignore)

vec3.comment: Third axis vector to define the measurement grid (required used for elevation calculation)

size1.comment: Length and distance between measurement points for first direction

size3.comment: Length and distance between measurement points for third direction

masslimit.comment: Coefficient to calculate mass of free-surface (default=0.5 on 3D and 0.4 on 2D)

outputdata.comment: Type of results requested (vel, veldir, rhop, zsurf)

output.comment: Creates CSV and binary files of measurements (default=false)

vec1.comment: First axis vector to define the measurement grid

vec2.comment: Second axis vector to define the measurement grid

size1.comment: Length and distance between measurement points for first direction

size2.comment: Length and distance between measurement points for second direction

kclimit.comment: Minimum value of sum_wab_vol to apply the Kernel Correction. Use NONE to disable (default=NONE)
